name: Kingdom Come: Deliverance - Treasures of The Past
name_original: Kingdom Come: Deliverance - Treasures of The Past
description: <h3>Special Offer</h3><p>https://store.steampowered.com/app/1033890/Kingdom_Come_Deliverance__A_Womans_Lot/</p><br/><h3>About the Game</h3><h3>Treasures of the Past DLC contains</h3><ul><li>Treasure maps of the lords banished by King Sigismund of Hungary, leading to the hidden treasures of those patriots, bandits and schemers.<br/></li><li>The mythical armor of the Warhorse tribe. Shrouded in mystery - it is said that the original wearer purged all the dragons from the Kingdom of Bohemia.</li></ul>
